name: Sandbag Training
description: Building strength and stability using unstable resistance from sandbags.

cards.title: Sandbag Cleans for Full-Body Power
cards.description: A dynamic lift that enhances functional strength and explosiveness.
bulletpoints: Use a strong hip extension to propel the sandbag upward
Maintain a tight core to stabilize the movement
Control the descent to build eccentric strength
cards.summaryText: Explode the bag up with hips fired, then lower under control for total-body gains.

cards.title: Overhead Sandbag Carry for Stability
cards.description: Carrying a sandbag overhead to develop stability and shoulder endurance.
bulletpoints: Keep arms locked out and core engaged
Walk with controlled steps to maintain balance
Use different grip variations to challenge coordination
cards.summaryText: Hold the bag overhead and walk steady so shoulders and core stay braced.
